page.title: 12THE VILLAGE SHOPS
page.content: In our village we have got{four shops although one of them is really a house where greengrocery is sold.The{general {stores,}sometimes called the{top shop, is larger than the other shops and is mostly self service. The stores sells {groceries, wines}and{spirits}and {household goods.}It also sells {newspapers}and opens every day, including sunday mornings. The {butchers shop}is modern inside and sells a good range of{meat.}There is a shop next door to the{butchers}but it is empty The{post office}is very small and is like two shops in one. The post master has a section at the back and the rest of the shop sells{groceries, {toys}and{odds}and{ends.}The {greengroceries}is at the back of a house and the lady is very kind she gives children scraps for their pets. by{Tony Jones (11)
